people.name: Betty Barnes
people.notes: Servant

people.name: John Belford
people.notes: A close friend and confidante of Mr. Lovelace

people.name: Widow Bevis
people.notes: A lively widow in Hampstead

people.name: Elias Brand
people.notes: A young clergyman

people.name: Hannah Burton
people.notes: Servant of the Harlowe family

people.name: Thomas Doleman
people.notes: Libertine, gentleman, companion of Mr. Lovelace

people.name: Clarissa Harlowe
people.notes: A young and virtuous woman, the protagonist of our novel

people.name: Arabella Harlowe
people.notes: Clarissa's older sister

people.name: John Harlowe
people.notes: Clarissa's uncle (her father's elder brother)

people.name: Antony Harlowe
people.notes: Clarissa's uncle (her father's younger brother)

people.name: Mrs. Harlowe
people.notes: Clarissa's mother

people.name: James Harlowe Jr.
people.notes: Clarissa's brother, bitter enemy of Robert Lovelace

people.name: James Harlowe Sr.
people.notes: Clarissa's father

people.name: Dorothy Hervey
people.notes: Clarissa's aunt (Lady Charlotte Harlowe)'s half-sister

people.name: Dolly Hervey
people.notes: Daughter of Dorothy Hervey

people.name: Charles Hickman
people.notes: Miss Howe's suitor

people.name: Polly Horton
people.notes: Assistant of, and partner with, Mrs. Sinclair

people.name: Anabella Howe
people.notes: Clarissa's best friend and confidante

people.name: Mrs. Howe
people.notes: The mother of Miss Howe

people.name: Elizabeth Lawrance
people.notes: Half-sister of Lord M., widow, lady of honour and fortune

people.name: Joseph Leman
people.notes: Servant of the Harlowe family

people.name: Arthur Lewen
people.notes: One of Clarissa's educators, a divine of great piety and learning

people.name: Robert Lovelace
people.notes: The villain of the story and pursuer of Clarissa

people.name: Sally Martin
people.notes: Assistant of, and partner with, Mrs. Sinclair

people.name: Lord Montague
people.notes: Mr. Lovelace's uncle

people.name: Charlotte Montague
people.notes: Niece of Lord M., maiden lady of character

people.name: Patty Montague
people.notes: Niece of Lord M., maiden lady of character

people.name: Mrs. Moore
people.notes: A widowed gentlewoman, keeping a lodging-house at Hampstead

people.name: Mrs. Rawlins
people.notes: A notable young gentlewoman in Hampstead

people.name: William Morden
people.notes: A man of fortune, closely related to the Harlowe family

people.name: Richard Mowbray
people.notes: Libertine, gentleman, companion of Mr. Lovelace

people.name: Judith Norton
people.notes: Clarissa's nurse, an unhappy widow

people.name: Mrs. Sinclair
people.notes: The pretended name of a private brothel keeper in London; pretends to be Lady Betty

people.name: Roger Solmes
people.notes: A wealthy man whom Clarissa's parents wish her to marry

people.name: William Summers
people.notes: Servant of the Harlowe family

people.notes: Servant
